scripts.build-quarkus:dev:darwin:linux: cd quarkus-app && pnpm install:mvnw && mvn clean install -DskipTests
scripts.build-quarkus:dev:win32: cd quarkus-app && pnpm install:mvnw && pnpm powershell "mvn clean install `-DskipTests"
scripts.build-quarkus:prod:darwin:linux: cd quarkus-app && pnpm install:mvnw && mvn clean install -DskipTests=$(build-env tests.run --not) -Dmaven.test.failure.ignore=$(build-env tests.ignoreFailures)
scripts.build-quarkus:prod:win32: cd quarkus-app && pnpm install:mvnw && pnpm powershell "mvn clean install `-DskipTests=$(build-env tests.run --not) `-Dmaven.test.failure.ignore=$(build-env tests.ignoreFailures)"
scripts.build:dev: pnpm copy-assets && docker build . -f Containerfile -t dmn-dev-deployment-accelerator:latest
scripts.quarkus:dev: cd quarkus-app && mvn clean package quarkus:dev -DskipTests
